feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.24.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Fix] Schema panel null references by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13579
  • Fix calendar using locale aware start of week by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13599

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.24.0...2.24.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.24.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Correct types for application updating. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13601
  • Teal bug fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13593
  • Search tests for FieldType.LONGFORM by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13611
  • Search tests for FieldType.OPTIONS by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13612
  • Updating SQS server connection address by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13613
  • Make auto ID row creation in parallel more robust. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13606
  • Add free trial modal by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13609
  • Change attachment and single attachment columns by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13630
  • Fix behaviour of 'when filter empty' for empty and notEmpty filter types. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13633
  • Bump ejs from 3.1.9 to 3.1.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13591
  • Free trial close to expiration message by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13638
  • Remove aws sdk global mock and update tests by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13637
  • Tests for searching boolean fields, including fixes for various bugs. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13614

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.24.1...2.24.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.25.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • UI fixes from bug grooming by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13639
  • Typing improvements for REST integration - fixing no responses by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13640
  • Move parallel auto ID row creation test to row.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13644
  • Remove unnecessary jest.unmock calls. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13643
  • Disable autocolumn addition to external tables (API validation) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13645
  • Support attachment columns in Automations by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13567
  • Filter bindings by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13549
  • Improving binary column support by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13648
  • Remove the last internal.spec.ts file. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13651
  • Improving DatabaseImpl error handling by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13657

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.24.2...2.25.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.26.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Single user column type by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13543
  • Clean BBReferenceProcessor code by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13603
  • Fix filtering by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13615
  • Googlesheets user fixes by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13620
  • Fix user relationship to user column migration by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13594
  • Allow Fancy Input validation to be triggered onBlur by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13658
  • Fix tests depending on date by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13668
  • Deleting a column on google spreadsheet messes with the data by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13652
  • Fixing issue with grid not allowing copying external ID by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13650
  • Updating binding tests to test single column by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13656
  • Fix binding panel by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13669
  • [Feat] Single user column by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13604
  • Fix Collapsed Component Tree Not Expanding When a New Component Is Added Within It by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13628
  • Added changelog links to portal help section and version update modal by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13550

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.25.0...2.26.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.26.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove unused dependencies packages by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13584
  • Fixing AUTOMATION_THREAD_TIMEOUT environment variable by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13670

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.26.0...2.26.1
